abstract: To keep the deal from collapsing, BP must persuade Rosneft to extend the deadline or find a compromise with shareholders in its existing Russia venture.
snippet: To keep the deal from collapsing, BP must persuade Rosneft to extend the deadline or find a compromise with shareholders in its existing Russia venture.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — BP struggled Wednesday to salvage its deal with the Russian oil company Rosneft before a deadline to complete the pact expired on Thursday.

headline.main: BP Scrambles to Salvage Rosneft Deal as a Deadline Nears
headline.print_headline: BP Scrambles to Salvage Rosneft Deal as a Deadline Nears
